tr.task_description: Bir cümledeki özel isimleri, yer adlarını ve kurum adlarını tespit eder.

en.task_description: This tool detects the named entities in the given Turkish sentence.
en.usage_info: Input a single Turkish sentence in a single line.

paper_names: Improving Named Entity Recognition by Jointly Learning to Disambiguate Morphological Tags
paper_authors: Onur Güngör, Suzan Uskudarli, Tunga Güngör
